Room.Name: Adlermann Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Adlermann Way, just west of the entrance to the Aquarium.
Room.LongDescription: The large facility provides its guests with a first-hand look at all the wonderous and mysterious creatures of the deep. The Bendine Aquarium houses many fresh water fish and creatures, while the Marina houses many salt water creatures, including a few untamed ones. The Aquarium entrance is to the east. You can get to the Marina through the Aquarium.
